name: Dungeon Reaper
description: You are reaper. Your goal is to escape the dungeon you are kept as a slave in. But the boss of the dungeon doesn't want you to leave. The game itself is a pix elated top down perspective maze game where you have to use your mind to escape. The game is also quite short that is because the game is only part 1. There will be more of them with different styles: such as plat-former, beat 'em up or top down shooter.
